      Converts Boolean to string using ? "ON" : "OFF"

    • siValuesToDouble

      @Nullable public static @Nullable Double siValuesToDouble​(String text)
      Returns text with SI suffix as Double. If the suffix is not found, the method returns null. Example: text='123 MHz', returns 123E6

    • specialValuesToDouble

      @Nullable public static @Nullable Double specialValuesToDouble​(String text)
      Returns special value as Double. If not found, the method returns null

    • stringToDouble

      public static double stringToDouble​(String text, Double defValue)
      Converts string to Double value. Also recognizes case-insensitive "NAN", "+Inf", "-Inf" If you provide defValue, any parsing exception is suppressed and the method returns that defValue.

    • stringToDouble

      public static double stringToDouble​(String text)
      Converts string to Double value. Also recognizes case-insensitive "NAN", "+Inf", "-Inf" Throws NumberFormatException if the text is not convertible to double.

    • stringToFloat

      public static float stringToFloat​(String text, Float defValue)
      Converts string to Float value. Also recognizes case-insensitive "NAN", "+Inf", "-Inf" If you provide defValue, any parsing exception is suppressed and the method returns that defValue.

    • stringToFloat

      public static float stringToFloat​(String text)
      Converts string to Float value. Also recognizes case-insensitive "NAN", "+Inf", "-Inf" Throws NumberFormatException if the text is not convertible to float.

    • doubleToString

      public static String doubleToString​(double number)
      Converts double number to string using {0:g} formatter

    • specialValuesToInteger

      @Nullable public static @Nullable Integer specialValuesToInteger​(String text)
      Returns special value as Integer. If not found, the method returns null.

    • stringToInteger

      public static int stringToInteger​(String text, Integer defValue)
      Converts string to Int32 value. Also recognizes special text values If you provide defValue, any parsing exception is suppressed and the method returns that defValue.

    • stringToInteger

      public static int stringToInteger​(String text)
      Converts string to Integer value. Also recognizes case-insensitive "NAN", "+Inf", "-Inf" Throws NumberFormatException if the text is not convertible to integer.

    • stringToEnum

      public static <T extends Enum<?>> T stringToEnum​(Class<T> enumeration, String search, boolean ignoreCase, boolean ignoreUnderscores)
      Converts string to an enum case-insensitive, and/or without underscores. Throws an exception if the enumeration does not contain the search string.

    • stringToDoubleArray

      public static double[] stringToDoubleArray​(String text, Double defaultValues)
      Converts string with comma-separated values to array of Doubles If you provide defValue, any parsing exception is suppressed and the method returns that defValue Also recognizes case-insensitive "NAN", "+Inf", "-Inf" ... If the text is null or empty, the method returns array with 0-length

    • stringToDoubleArray

      public static double[] stringToDoubleArray​(String text)
      Converts string with comma-separated values to array of Doubles Also recognizes case-insensitive "NAN", "+Inf", "-Inf" If the text is null or empty, the method returns array with 0-length

    • stringToFloatArray

      public static float[] stringToFloatArray​(String text, Float defaultValues)
      Converts string with comma-separated values to array of Single Floats If you provide defValue, any parsing exception is suppressed and the method returns that defValue Also recognizes case-insensitive "NAN", "+Inf", "-Inf"

    • stringToFloatArray

      public static float[] stringToFloatArray​(String text)
      Converts string with comma-separated values to array of Floats Also recognizes case-insensitive "NAN", "+Inf", "-Inf" If the text is null or empty, the method returns array with 0-length

    • stringToInt32Array

      public static int[] stringToInt32Array​(String text, Integer defaultValues)
      Converts string with comma-separated values to array of int values. Also recognizes case-insensitive "NAN"(=Int32.MinValue), "+Inf"(=Int32.MaxValue), "-Inf"(=Int32.MinValue) If you provide defValue, any parsing exception is suppressed and the method returns that defValue. If the text is null or empty, the method returns array with 0-length

    • stringToInt32Array

      public static int[] stringToInt32Array​(String text)
      Converts string with comma-separated values to array of int values. Also recognizes case-insensitive "NAN"(=Int32.MinValue), "+Inf"(=Int32.MaxValue), "-Inf"(=Int32.MinValue) If the text is null or empty, the method returns array with 0-length

    • bytesToFloat32Array

      public static double[] bytesToFloat32Array​(byte[] data)
      Converts Binary data byte[] to 4 Bytes/Number array of Doubles. The array is returned as double[] type

    • bytesToFloat32ArraySwapped

      public static double[] bytesToFloat32ArraySwapped​(byte[] data)
      Converts Binary data byte[] to 4 Bytes/Number array of Doubles with swapped endianness The array is returned as double[] type

    • bytesToArrayOfDoubleNumbers

      public static double[] bytesToArrayOfDoubleNumbers​(byte[] data, InstrBinaryFloatNumbersFormat binaryFloatNumbersFormat)
      Decodes binary data to an array of floating-point numbers based on the entered format. The return value is always a common double array

    • bytesToArrayOfDoubleNumbers

      public static double[] bytesToArrayOfDoubleNumbers​(byte[] data, boolean binData, InstrBinaryFloatNumbersFormat binaryFloatNumbersFormat)
      Converts to double float array from the byte[] array either as binary or as ascii data

    • bytesToArrayOfSingleFloatNumbers

      public static float[] bytesToArrayOfSingleFloatNumbers​(byte[] data, InstrBinaryFloatNumbersFormat binaryFloatNumbersFormat)
      Decodes binary data to an array of floating-point numbers single precision based on the entered format. The formats Double8Bytes and Double8BytesSwapped are not allowed

    • bytesToArrayOfSingleFloatNumbers

      public static float[] bytesToArrayOfSingleFloatNumbers​(byte[] data, boolean binData, InstrBinaryFloatNumbersFormat binaryFloatNumbersFormat)
      Converts to single float array from the byte[] array either as binary or as ascii data

      Converts Binary data byte[] to 4 Bytes/Number array of Integers. The array is returned as int32[] type

    • bytesToInt32ArraySwapped

      public static int[] bytesToInt32ArraySwapped​(byte[] data)
      Converts Binary data byte[] to 4 Bytes/Number array of Integers swapped endianness The array is returned as int32[] type

    • bytesToInt16Array

      public static int[] bytesToInt16Array​(byte[] data)
      Converts Binary data byte[] to 2 Bytes/Number array of Integers. The array is returned as int32[] type

      public static int[] bytesToInt16ArraySwapped​(byte[] data)
      Converts Binary data byte[] to 2 Bytes/Number array of Integers swapped endianness The array is returned as int32[] type
